Uses of Package
org.deeplearning4j.spark.api

  • Packages that use org.deeplearning4j.spark.api 
    Package Description
    org.deeplearning4j.spark.api

  • Classes in org.deeplearning4j.spark.api used by org.deeplearning4j.spark.api 
    Class and Description
    RDDTrainingApproach
    Approach to use when training from a JavaRDD<DataSet> or JavaRDD<MultiDataSet>.
    Repartition
    Enumeration that is used for specifying the behaviour of repartitioning in ParameterAveragingTrainingMaster (and possibly elsewhere.
    RepartitionStrategy
    RepartitionStrategy: different strategies for conducting repartitioning on training data, when repartitioning is required.
    SparkDefault: repartition using Spark's standard RDD.repartition(int) method.
    TrainingHook
    A hook for the workers when training.
    TrainingResult
    TrainingResult: a class used by TrainingMaster implementations Each TrainingMaster will have its own type of training result.
    TrainingWorker
    TrainingWorker is a small serializable class that can be passed (in serialized form) to each Spark executor for actually conducting training.
    WorkerConfiguration
    A simple configuration object (common settings for workers)
  • Classes in org.deeplearning4j.spark.api used by org.deeplearning4j.spark.api.worker 
    Class and Description
    TrainingResult
    TrainingResult: a class used by TrainingMaster implementations Each TrainingMaster will have its own type of training result.
    TrainingWorker
    TrainingWorker is a small serializable class that can be passed (in serialized form) to each Spark executor for actually conducting training.
  • Classes in org.deeplearning4j.spark.api used by org.deeplearning4j.spark.earlystopping 
    Class and Description
    TrainingMaster
    A TrainingMaster controls how distributed training is executed in practice
    In principle, a large number of different approches can be used in distributed training (synchronous vs.
